Text: yup, out of sync... try 350 ms delay...

hunt_0710 is right, out of sync, but easily corrected,
click tools, track sync,advance audio over video + 350 ms
there we all just learned how to sync a movie :)

If u r using media player classic (K-lite)..
Go to... Options> Internal Filters> Audio Switcher and set the audio time shift 350 ms and hit apply. (requires restarting the player).. :)
